entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:29 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 3:41 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
